name: Maneuver
shortContent: Take an Opposed WP test to move opponent 1 meter.
content:
By using superior footwork and aggression, the attacker can
force his opponent to move one meter in any direction by
succeeding at an Opposed Weapon Skill Test. If desired, the
attacker can advance one meter as well. The opponent cannot
be forced into another character or some other obstacle (such
as wall).
